page.title: 06A NOT SO KINDLY MONSTER
page.content: {A NOT SO KINDLY MONSTER There is another monster near us which has affected life and opinions in our local area.This is Torness Nuclear Power Station which is being built on the coast six miles from here. For some years now this has caused divided opinions and heated arguments among local people.Some believe that Torness will provide employment and prosperity and indeed in the short term this appears to have been the case. Others are acutely aware of the dangers of Nuclear Power and sevaral pressure groups were formed to protest against the building of the power station. The general feeling in locally was that the last thing people wanted was a Nuclear Power Station on their doorstep.At present the matter is dormant.
